cgc_sync__Active__c.description: Indicates whether the tracked object is active (true) or not (false).

cgc_sync__Allow_Null__c.description: Indicates whether null values instead of default datatype values in the offline database are allowed (true) or not (false).

cgc_sync__Batch_SOQL_Param_Chunk_Size__c.description: Batch SOQL parameter chunk size in bytes.

cgc_sync__Clear_Upload_Failures__c.description: Indicates whether to clear upload failures for this tracked object (true) or not (false).

cgc_sync__Custom_Index_List2__c.description: Custom set of indexes named List2 for the current object.

cgc_sync__Custom_Index_List3__c.description: Custom set of indexes named List3 for the current object.

cgc_sync__Custom_Index_List4__c.description: Custom set of indexes named List4 for the current object.

cgc_sync__Custom_Index_List__c.description: Custom set of indexes named List for the current object.

cgc_sync__Displayable__c.description: Indicates whether to display this object in the mobile app (true) or not (false).

cgc_sync__Enable_Enhanced_Delta_Sync__c.description: Indicates whether the delta sync is active (true) or not (false).

cgc_sync__Fieldset_Name_List__c.description: Comma-separated list of field set names for the object.

cgc_sync__Layout_Needed__c.description: Indicates whether this layout is required in the mobile app (true) or not (false).

cgc_sync__List_Header_Fieldset__c.description: List header of the field set.

cgc_sync__Max_Records_Before_Full_Sync__.description: Maximum number of single records that the device can sync before switching to full sync mode.

cgc_sync__Object_Api_Name__c.description: API name of the tracked object.

cgc_sync__On_the_Road_Sync__c.description: Enable (true) or disable (false) synchronizing only tracked objects marked as On The Road Sync.

cgc_sync__Only_Metadata_Needed__c.description: Indicates whether only metadata is allowed and no data is downloaded for this tracked object (true) or not (false).

cgc_sync__SF_Rest_Enabled__c.description: Indicates whether the client must use standard Salesforce REST API to synchronize tracked objects (true) or not (false).

cgc_sync__Sync_Overview_Condition_Field_.description: Condition to display this record on the Sync Overview screen as a pending upload.

cgc_sync__Sync_Overview__c.description: Indicates whether to display this record in sync overview (true) or not (false).

cgc_sync__Sync_Record_Weight__c.description: Weight of this record. Weight of a record is directly proportional to the computational resources that are required for processing.

cgc_sync__Tracked_Relationship__c.description: Specifies the dependency on another tracked object. Clients can evaluate this field to propagate sync states from child to parent records.

cgc_sync__Tracking_enabled__c.description: Indicates whether a tracked object relationship must be considered (true) or ignored (false).

cgc_sync__Where_2__c.description: Second part of the where clause.

cgc_sync__Where_3__c.description: Third part of the where clause.

cgc_sync__Where_4__c.description: Fourth part of the where clause.
